name: Waldorf Redux Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 Pink Lady, Honeycrisp, or Fuji apples

recipeInstructions.text: Mix1/2 of the raspberries and walnuts into the yogurt. Squeeze a small amount of lemon into the mixture. Dollop onto two (chilled) plates. Top with remaining nuts and berries.
Slice both apples. Fan the slices around the center of each yogurt mixture. Top with raisins.
Drizzle apples with honey if desired. Garnish with half a stalk of celery
